LeetCode

leetcode刷题代码，解题思路写在注释中

2. 两数相加.md

var addTwoNumbers = function(l1, l2) {
   let item = new ListNode(-1);
   let head = item;
   let add = 0;
   while(true){
       if(l1==null){
           item.next = l2;
           break;
       }
       if(l2==null){
           item.next = l1;
           break;
       }
       let num =l1.val+l2.val+add;
       if(num>=10){
           add = 1;
           num = num-10;
       }else{
           add=0;
       }
       item.next = new ListNode(num);
       l1 = l1.next;
       l2 = l2.next;
       item = item.next;
   }
   while(add!==0){
       if(item.next == null&&add>0){
           item.next = new ListNode(add);
           break;
       }
       let num =item.next.val+add;
       if(num>=10){
           add = 1;
           num = num-10;
       }else{
           add=0;
       }
       item.next.val = num;
       item = item.next;
   }
   return head.next;
};
